item.title: JioMart on WhatsApp a big opportunity for Meta, says Mark Zuckerberg
item.description: JioMart on WhatsApp a big opportunity for Meta, says Mark Zuckerberg As Meta doubles down on its monetisation drive across its family of apps, its Founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg has said that JioMart on WhatsApp in India will be a big opportunity for the paid messaging market.
